website_summaries.verdict: The Nike LunarEpic Flyknit Low is a road running shoe designed for neutral foot movement. This shoe provides a blend of cushioning, comfort and responsive ride. It is great to use for daily training and short mile runs. Though the shoe received a few negative comments, some happy users still appreciate and found the shoe as a worthy investment.
pros: Most runners mentioned that the shoe is comfortable and feels light
The upper construction provides a seamless, sock-like fit
A number of runners were satisfied with the durability of the Nike LunarEpic Flyknit Low
The shoe provides a plush and flexible ride, according to some reviews
cons: Some users complained that small debris get stuck in the sole and hard to remove
The shoe lacks the needed support as mentioned in some user reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe. Start your own your own gravel collection!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen it everywhere this shoe is reviewed. It collects and keeps small rocks with every single foot step. The rocks are tiny and I personally do nothing to remove them. The insole is a little dodgy when it comes to staying put when you slip the shoes on. Other than that it looks and performs just great for me as an older beginner runner. The Flyknit and flywire tech are an upgrade and definitely worth What they do for comfort and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Trashbag

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for jumping rope, good bounce, very tight for those with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These fit way more snug than I expected, but its also a good thing because my foot feels secure. I needed a good shoe for jumping rope and this does the job. These provide good cushion for the balls of my feet, as well as my heels when I do squats. Ordering the right size can be a bit confusing due to all the convoluted options.(why can't they just say whether the shoes are wide, narrow, etc.?) Please note that the laces are for show, so if they give out its no big deal, they don't do anything because the shoe is so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug, but
customer_reviews.text: A very light, comfortable running shoe that conforms to the shape of your foot and looks great. I've been wearing Nike running shoes for years now, but this is my first pair of Flyknits. These slip on and off like slippers, but still have a somewhat decent amount of support. They're a tad snug for my liking though. I usually wear a size 10 in Nikes, and the 10 here squeezes my foot. Not too snug for me to return them, but snug enough that I wish I'd ordered a half-size up. Overall, a very good pair of running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my girlfriend. She has informed me that on both pairs the soles of the shoes are coming off. Either the glue used is very old or otherwise defective. She only used them for work. No running or other type of working out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes I've ever own. They are lightweight, real responsive and supportive. These sneakers do a great job of making me feel great during and after each run. I didn't give a five star rating because they do have one draw back. If you get caught in the rain while on a run or you don't care to run in the rain, I don't recommend these shoes. These shoes are not water proof in any way. If step in a puddle water will go into the sneaker and soak your socks. Otherwise these sneakers are the best.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Color and comfort = good, for working out = bad
customer_reviews.text: Color and comfort = good, for working out = bad Nike is by far the best fit for my feet. Sadly, these guys just don't do it for me. They are very comfortable, but offer very little support for either running to moderate agility (side-to-side) exercises in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! Long runs, marathon pace work, and easy runs are all a breeze in this shoe. The fit is spot-on and produces no hot spots in the silky flyknit upper. I want more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great looks
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sports shoes. Very good quality and design. It's comfortable on the gym. But on treadmill, it needs to be worn a little bit I think. It wasn't as comfortable as I expected. I am sure I'll get used to though. Anyways I'd recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Osman S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is everything.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Very comfortable. I feel like i can wear it the whole day without any issues. I would recommend this if you are looking for an overall shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gran Alexie

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me!
customer_reviews.text: I requested a “buy again “ which was a size “13” but received two size “11” pairs. I would rate them a 6, if received the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce G

customer_reviews.title: Comfort counts for everything
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes they fit like a glove on my narrow feet. I bought five pairs in different colors. I wear them to work on my feet every day.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nike Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of running shoes. Extremely comfortable. I got the US Men's Size 9 (my normal size) and it fit perfectly. I have these shoes in both high-top and low-top, and both versions are great for running/long walks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: However once I broke them in after a couple of runs these felt amazing, weren’t as tight as they had felt before
customer_reviews.text: Had to break these in to truly appreciate them, I wish they had a wide option, maybe going half a size up could solve that problem. However once I broke them in after a couple of runs these felt amazing, weren’t as tight as they had felt before. Very comfortable and responsive and surprisingly light, also they hug your foot just right. Probably my favorite pair of running shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are comfortable and the soles are super soft
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and the soles are super soft. At first they seemed a little small but they loosen up fast and now they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Stay on the concrete!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little tight but it’s a good shoe. Was hard to find. The only bad thing is that if you walk on rocky paths, the sole picks up rocks like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden H

customer_reviews.title: good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The heel of the shoe fits a little funny. This is a great shoe very comfortable ride for running!
customer_reviews.author: awesomesauceflips

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for my beloved LunarTempo 2's. But this is a very different shoe. Unlike the LunarTempo, which conformed to the shape of my feet on all sides, the LunarEpics have a lump in the midsole that made them uncomfortable even to walk in. I stopped wearing them altogether after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon J. Miro

customer_reviews.title: Awful in heat
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern California and bought these shoes because they were super comfy and offered great support. They were a tad tight on the top of my foot, but otherwise felt great. The issues i had occurred when a heat wave hit SoCal. Temp was around 105F and i had left my shoes in my car to workout after work. THEY LITERALLY MELTED!! They shrunk down and became unusable after a few hours in the heat. I would certainly recommend against this product if you live anywhere remotely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Zaida M.

customer_reviews.title: The shoe seemed to be two sizes too small.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looked great, but they were way too small. I ordered my normal size so I was very disappointed that they did not fit. They seem to be at least two sizes too small. It's hard to order shoes online if the shoe size is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He has the blue version and the gray version. The box did arrive crushed, but the seller was very nice in trying to meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and durable shoe. I have owned this pair for about 4 or 5 months and they are holding up great. I'll get the next size larger next time. Really just need to offer it in a wide but still a great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Blisters Ever
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these shoes gave ne the biggest blisters ever. I have had numerous "flyknit" shoes over the years and have been able to start working out with them (speed walking) immediately out of the box. Not these. Day one and the blisters on both heels were the size of silver dollars. I tried them because they had a different sole from the others and I had hoped it would extend the life. Wrong!! Bad assumption on my part. I'll go back to the others...
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ciammachilli

customer_reviews.title: Especially happy after disappointment with those stupid rubber band shoelace replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: At last, a shoe that stays on my foot when i'm running, even after I yanked the laces out. Especially happy after disappointment with those stupid rubber band shoelace replacement thingees that break within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Road Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Tight fit but snug for support. Great cushion for those with bad knees. If you’re short you get like half an inch from the sole ;).
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sneaker!! My son bought me my first pair for past holidays so I had to buy another cuz they are one of the most comfortable sneakers I ever had. I don’t run, but I have bad knee and ankle, and these are so comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Staniscia

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Arrived next day after ordering. Looked just as described but not as shown in the picture. Picture shown green lagoon color but description had the blue lagoon with pink and green. Just pay attention to the description and you're good.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these shoes pretty much every day. He likes them visually and for comfort. They hold up well. He has had them 5 to 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I stand all day at work, these are the most comfortable sneaker I've ever owned
customer_reviews.author: D Fett

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning, lockdown around ankles could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. I definitely enjoy running in these between 5-10k. My only concern is I do not get a great lockdown feeling around my ankles. I was surprised at how light they are.
customer_reviews.author: RyanR

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I should have probably oredered a half size up. They run a little small but I might feel differently after a month or so of breaking them in. They're also light as a feather!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Slick shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use these to run in pretty often. They're light, and plenty cushioned - even for a 6'2 240 lb guy. I wouldn't use them for anything where you might need to cut laterally often. Perfect for what I'm using them for though. If you like to run, you'll like the feel. Look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: Best to run
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of the trainers I bought. The best option for running.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running and bike riding shoes
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the same exact shoes I was wearing. Nike Lunarepic 2. Excellent running and bike riding shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bicycle

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. My husband loves this shoes. Has 3 pairs. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Katey P.

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite sneakers of all time for working out
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sneakers of all time for working out. Very comfortable and they look great too with the all black color option.
customer_reviews.author: G.Y

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my teenage son. They looked like holy heck after just a few outings. the mesh did not hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Shoe is HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Foot feels like it's going to just come out of it; no support. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I really love the color and the fit is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color and the fit is perfect for me. I have flat feet and something with a bit more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe, amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are always in pain. I suffered a spinal cord injury and have recovered to the point of being able to walk with a massive limp. For years, I have struggles to find a show to wear that offers support, cushion, padding and stability. This shoe, solves them all.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A Tuscany

customer_reviews.title: Solid running shoe with a good deal of cushioning
customer_reviews.text: The sole and cushion is phenomenal. The fit of the shoe feels a bit narrow and constrained. I think it's due to the flyknit, as I loved the previous lunarlon models.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Eyster

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and look great. A little tight at first but break in easy
customer_reviews.author: Sean Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I love them. They are very comfortable and love the look
customer_reviews.author: Adi's

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Nike Flyknit. They fit like socks and is really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Wai Tak Yip

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I’ve bought in awhile
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I got three colors and gave some as gifts but they are hard to find now
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: One of the best shoes for everything honestly. Lasted me for over a year and still doing great.!
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan

customer_reviews.title: If you run barefoot this is the shoe for you
customer_reviews.text: Had blisters my entire life. Feet bleeding and crappy bandages. I run barefoot and haven’t had a blister since
customer_reviews.author: Emma Tabei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: Good performance when excercising, but they fell little light and weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but these are now my most comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Nike Free exclusively, but these are now my most comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them! They look great and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice workout shoe. one of the most comfortable I've worn..
customer_reviews.author: The american

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I hope nike would get them back on the market.
customer_reviews.author: IJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and felt great while exercising in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the second gen Lunarepic’s! I bought several pairs to stock up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very difficult to put on. The foot opening is very restricted in size and is unlike most other shoes. You have to position your foot just right in order to have any chance off getting the shoe on. That alone is enough for the poor rating in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Casey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes! Nike has done a great job staying a step ahead of the market!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: false advertisement, wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a men's sized shoe, received a women's size
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: A perfect exercise shoe
customer_reviews.text: The fit on this shoe is the best I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: tomvg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband’s favorite shoes. He has gone through many pairs. He purchased the previous pair directly from Nike. These are the exact same shoe. The seller also upgraded us to Priority shipping free of charge!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Been in the Lunar Flyknits for years and this one is top notch. Fit, cushion, and weight are great for running. Half marathon distances for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shoes, but way too narrow for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They shrink when they get wet!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair until they got wet in a rain storm and shrank at least 1 size....approx 1/2 ".Now too small to wear as the knit shrank so much it curled the toe up. Very disappointed after just 5 months wear.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable! Great fit! I've ran in these a few times now and they are so bouncy and light. Only reason I gave them 4 stars was because of the price tag, but it seems like all quality running shoes are over $100.
customer_reviews.author: michael seman

customer_reviews.title: Person said they fit were comfortable and came in good
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. Person said they fit were comfortable and came in good time
customer_reviews.author: tina jacintho

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly good shoes. Easy to run and play in, and light. I would recommend getting colorful laces because with out laces they look pretty boring.
customer_reviews.author: J.Bond

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were too thin. I thought wearing them, running, and exercising in them would loosen them up some, but it didn't. So, I wasted a $140.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and I receive many a-compliments on how comfortable they appear!
customer_reviews.author: Andy V

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable running shoes I’ve ever worn!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lite, excellent design on the soles! Great for runnning or power walks. I also wear them when I’m going out about the town or clubs.
customer_reviews.author: MVazquez

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I am a 8.5 US for Vans and it fits snug. I sometimes remove the lace for a clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: True size
customer_reviews.text: I used nike sneakers size 11 and this fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Paola Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect, great support and look even better than the photos!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Havstad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable running shoes. The best I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoes. Saved my sore flat feet on a week full of theme parks!
customer_reviews.author: becky Taylor

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. Not a lot of support for running, but excellent for walking and everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, not a lot of support, so I put in my own inserts. I own two pairs of these shoes and I have no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes one of my favorite styles
customer_reviews.text: I love them for walking my dog and just a everyday tennis shoe very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Corazalla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is ready to run comfortably on day one. No breaking in necessary. 3rd pair purchased.
customer_reviews.author: KC Kinetic

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. Never been a big fan of Nike for serious running shoes but these are definitely doing good so far. Most comfortable shoe I’ve ever had or ran in by far.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very uncomfortable. Keep slipping off my feet as I try to run with it. The most uncomfortable shoe ever try to exercise with
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Nnamani

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. The shoes looked like they had been wear by someone else for last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are some great shoes I just think I should have got a 12.5 instead of a 12
customer_reviews.author: ANTONIO LIPSCOMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Time!
customer_reviews.text: My poppa really liked these shoes I bought him for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to come in but they feel great and I have been running in them since.
customer_reviews.author: Bosi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to wear, fits perfect, excellent to gym and run.
customer_reviews.author: Adriano Bello

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and love to use at the gym worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Moya Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my grandson for his birthday and he loves them.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T. Hall

customer_reviews.title: and they are easy to slip on and go
customer_reviews.text: Supports my feet well, and they are easy to slip on and go.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 5 and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Insanely light @ 10 oz. for a size 11.5 and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Enriquez Jr

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable from the moment I put them on
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable from the moment I put them on. I have a very hard to fit narrow foot. These are AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Pantella

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits comfortable , thanks to the lunar tech and i will order another one but a hightop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just got them. So far so good. Really comfortable Walked 6 miles in them and still feel great
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P Cullnan

customer_reviews.title: The comfortableness
customer_reviews.text: It’s so comfortable I use them for work and it’s makes the hours fly
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it. It looks great, just like in the picture. Definitely worth the money I spent. Would buy again in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Too small, too tight, doesn’t stretch
customer_reviews.text: Too small, I had to force my foot in it. Once the shoe is on, it is just too tight. Very uncomfortable, also the fabric doesn’t stretch. I don’t know what Nike was thinking about, wouldn’t recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CedM.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like tempurpedic pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I walk about 3-5 miles a day and need to wear supportive comfortable shoes, and these Nike LunarEpic Flyknit 2's do the job great. The last pair of running shoes I had were the Saucony Guide 7's and they were pretty good, but these nikes feel like you're walking on tempurpedic pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and very light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and very light. I bought the black and white combination looks nice with my grey adidas sweatpants
customer_reviews.author: ADIL

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, it allows for a nice full stride. Stretchy laces and flynit allow for a snug fit. Overall, a comfortable, smart looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: l like these different from the norm. Look just like the picture. Time will tell how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amozon shopper

customer_reviews.title: they looked awesome, just wish they would have fit
customer_reviews.text: only complaint is they didn't fit! I even ordered a half size bigger! they looked awesome, just wish they would have fit!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: One Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were far narrower that I epected - unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: From toe to heel the fit is fine however it very tight at the middle
customer_reviews.text: My true size is US8. From toe to heel the fit is fine however it very tight at the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Men's 844862-999 Trail Running Shoes, Multicoloured, 42 EU
product_meta.description: Original and exklusive sport products by Nike
